articles.title: Pyongyangites Meet
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Meet
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Pyongyangites met at Kim Il Sung Square on Thursday to express their resolution to carry out the important tasks advanced by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, senior party and state officials, officials of party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, cooperative farms, labor innovators and other working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Kim Su Gil, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee and chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said the respected Supreme Leader's New Year Address serves as important guidelines instilling confidence in the sure victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and optimism into the Korean people and clearly indicating the path to be taken by them and as a banner inspiring the army and people to the general offensive for making new upsurge and innovation in all sectors of building a socialist power. 
					
					 He called on all officials and Party members and other working people to turn out in the all-people struggle to foil the last-ditch challenge by the hostile forces and put the overall power of the DPRK on a new stage of development by holding high the revolutionary slogan "Let us launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country!" this year marking the 70th birthday of the DPRK, the glorious motherland.
					
					 He underlined the need for them to get united more firmly around the great Party and stage a more dynamic struggle to hasten the final victory of the Juche revolution according to the blueprint unfolded by the Supreme Leader in his New Year Address.
					
					 Pledge-taking speeches were made.
					
					 The speakers reiterated their resolution to thoroughly carry out this year's tasks set forth by the Party without fail by cherishing the truth that the plan and determination of the Party Central Committee just mean science, truth and practice and giving fullest play to the spirit of devotedly implementing the Party polices and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					 Then there was a procession of the participants.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Myanmar
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Htin Kyaw, president of Myanmar, Thursday on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president of Myanmar greater success in his responsible work for the progress and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to FM of Myanmar
articles.content:
Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, foreign minister of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to his Myanmar counterpart Aung San Suu Kyi on Thursday on the occasion of the 70th independence anniversary of Myanmar.
					 The message expressed the belief that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would steadily develop.

articles.title: New Year Address Indicating Milestone of Victory
articles.content:
New Year Address Indicating Milestone of Victory
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- After receiving the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the DPRK people are filled with great delight.
					 The respected Supreme Leader said in his New Year Address that as he looks back upon last year, when he worked strenuously on the road of achieving national prosperity, gaining great strength and wisdom from the pure minds of the dauntless people who invariably trusted and followed the Workers' Party of Korea even in the face of manifold difficulties and trials, he feels his heart swelling with the pride in waging the revolution shoulder to shoulder with a great people.
					
					 Kim Chon Su, department director of the Ministry of Chemical Industry, told KCNA:
					
					 The New Year Address indicates the milestone of victory. Studying the New Year Address, I was filled with confidence.
					
					 We will make great innovations in the drive to realize Juche-orientation and modernization of chemical industry this year, the third year of implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 We will phase the establishment of the C1 chemical industry on the basis of achievements made last year, push ahead with the projects for catalyst production base and phosphate fertilizer factory as scheduled, and renovate and perfect the sodium carbonate production line whose starting material is glauberite, thus laying a solid material and technical foundation of the chemical industry.
					
					 To Jong Chol, vice president of the State Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 Through the New Year Address of the respected Supreme Leader, I knew well his noble idea of giving importance to science.
					
					 We will actively wage collective campaign of brains and intelligence to defend the Party Central Committee like defence scientists and workers who made great victories to demonstrate to the world that the plans and decisions of the WPK are a science and a truth and that they automatically mean their materialization.
					
					 We will focus all efforts on solving sci-tech problems arising in enhancing the independence and Juche character of the national economy this year as the respected Supreme Leader taught in his New Year Address that a shortcut to developing the self-sufficient economy is to give precedence to science and technology and make innovations in economic planning and guidance.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Frenzy for Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams Japanese Reactionaries' Frenzy for Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become all the more pronounced in their frenzy for escalating confrontation with the DPRK after the great November event in the DPRK.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Thursday says:
					
					 Soon after the adoption of the UN Security Council "sanctions resolution" 2397, Japanese Prime Minister Abe stressed the need to force the DPRK to change its policy through more thorough-going implementation of the "resolution", and the riff-raffs including the chief Cabinet secretary vowed to strongly urge the international community to fully implement the "resolution" and blustered about new moves in months to come. The Japanese reactionaries even made public a plan on independent additional sanctions while asking the international community to put "extreme pressure" on the DPRK over its test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-15 and "human rights" issue.
					
					 Japan is deliberately linking the nuclear issue of the DPRK which poses no problem to its security, while dancing to the war tunes of lunatic Trump. The aim sought by it is to get rid of the yoke of a war criminal state and turn the country into an aggression state, a war state.
					
					 It would be a great mistake for it to think that the Japanese archipelago would be safe under the "nuclear umbrella" of the U.S. and with its backing.
					
					 Now that the whole U.S. land is within the nuclear striking range of the DPRK, it is clear to everyone that it would not be of any trouble for the DPRK to reduce Japan to ashes.
					
					 It is like a dangerous gambling over the crucial issue of the security of the Japanese proper and the Japanese people to get frantic in escalating confrontation with the DPRK while taking advantage of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Vigorous Advance for Fresh Victory
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Vigorous Advance for Fresh Victory
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an editorial says the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un reflects his steel-strong will to achieve a new victory in the building of a powerful socialist country this year greeting the 70th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea by giving full play to the might of our single-minded unity and self-reliance and self-development capability.
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The Supreme Leader's New Year Address serves as an inspiring banner that gives the confidence in sure victory to the Korean army and people.
					
					 He in the New Year Address proudly declared that we have realized the wish of the great leaders who devoted all their life to providing the strongest national defence capability for reliably safeguarding the country's sovereignty, and we have created a mighty sword for defending peace, as desired by all our people who had to tighten their belts for long years.
					
					 He also set forth the revolutionary slogan "Let us launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country!" and clearly indicated the tasks and ways for this year's struggle.
					
					 No force on the earth can block the vigorous advance of Juche Korea as it is under the outstanding and tested guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea which leads our style socialism to victory, weathering the tempest of history in the van, and its army and people are steadily carrying into practice the idea and resolution of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to achieve a fresh victory on all the fronts of building a powerful socialist country this significant year, in hearty response to the New Year Address of the Supreme Leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Usher in a New Golden Age of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il", a letter of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and compatriots in Japan on the 60th anniversary of the Association, was brought out in booklet at the Forum Book Publishing House of Russia on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 A book releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Dec. 25 last year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il were held in Nigeria, the Czech Republic, Germany and Bulgaria from Dec. 12 to 15 last year to commemorate the sixth anniversary of his demise.
					 The national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria stressed that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is a great guardian of the socialist cause as he instilled faith and courage into the world progressive people by turning the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and a military power despite the severe tempest of history with the Songun politics.
					
					 The chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said the special feats of Kim Jong Il were that he firmly defended socialism and the revolutionary gains with the treasured sword of Songun and laid a solid foundation for building a powerful country.
					
					 The chairman and members of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany praised Kim Jong Il as a peerless politician and his feats of Songun leadership.
					
					 The chief of the DPRK cultural and information centre in Vratsa City of Bulgaria and other speakers said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il regarded the people as Heaven and had devotedly worked for them. He is, indeed, a true popular leader.
					
					 The world is envious of the Korean people living in the socialist system where everything serves them. The struggle of the Korean people to defend the system and bring about a bright future is just and they will surely emerge victorious.

articles.title: Russian Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
articles.content:
Russian Media Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats
 Pyongyang, January 4 (KCNA) -- Media of Russia edited special write-ups interwoven with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos from Dec. 14 to 17 last year in commemoration of the sixth anniversary of his demise.
					 The newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda in an article under the title of "Eternal leader of Korean people" said that the ideas and lines of Kim Jong Il serve as the eternal banner showing the road ahead of the Korean people.
					
					 The article stressed that his feats are the eternal foundation guaranteeing the prosperity of Korea and happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 The newspaper Zavtra in an article "Snow and Kim Jong Il" said that his life was a pure one like snow.
					
					 The noble life of leader Kim Jong Il who had continued the journey of field guidance till the last moments of his life will be kept in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressive mankind forever, the article added.
					
					 The newspaper Kuban Segodnya carried an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il of DPRK will be immortal" praising him as an outstanding thinker-theoretician, a great master of art of leadership and a benevolent father of the people.
					
					 The internet newspaper Forum in an article "Sixth anniversary of demise of Korean people's leader Kim Jong Il" elaborated on the fact that the cause of immortalizing the great leaders has been brilliantly realized in the DPRK under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Novosibirsk Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and the Eastern Siberian Publishing House in Irkutsk Region carried articles praising the ideo- theoretical and Songun leadership feats of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Capitalinos juran cumplir tareas presentadas en el Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Capitalinos juran cumplir tareas presentadas en el Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 4 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin multitudinario de los capitalinos para cumplir las tareas importantes presentadas por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC, los cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el Poder, las entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas y los innovadores laborales y los trabajadores de diferentes sectores en la capital.
					
					El informe del acto estuvo a cargo Kim Su Gil, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y presidente del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang.
					
					El dijo que el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente es la guia programatica que multiplica al pueblo coreano la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y le ilumina el camino a seguir.
					
					Igualmente, deviene la bandera combativa que estimula energicamente a todos los militares y civiles a la ofensiva general para lograr nuevos saltos e innovaciones en todas las ramas de la construccion de la potencia socialista, anadio.
					
					Este ano significativo en que se cumple el aniversario 70 de la fundacion de la gloriosa RPDC, todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y trabajadores deben levantarse con dinamismo en la lucha de todo el pueblo para frustrar los desafios desesperados de las fuerzas hostiles y poner en la etapa de nuevo desarrollo el poderio nacional en su conjunto de la RPDC bajo la consigna revolucionaria "!Alcancemos nuevos triunfos en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista con una ofensiva general revolucionaria!", exhorto.
					
					  Unidos firmemente en torno al gran Partido, debemos luchar con dinamismo por adelantar la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche segun el maravilloso proyecto presentado por el Maximo Dirigente en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo, concluyo.
					
					  A continuacion, hubo discursos de juramento.
					
					Los oradores expresaron las decisiones de materializar incondicionalmente las tareas combativas, presentadas este ano por el Partido, haciendo uso del espiritu de materializacion a ultranza y el revolucionario de autoconfianza y perseverancia y acatando el principio de que el proyecto y la decision del Comite Central del Partido son la ciencia, la verdad y el hecho.
					
					Al final, tuvo lugar una marcha masiva.
